attributes.action: Making squatting in public conveniences a civil offense.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is common knowledge that Eastern Europeans are squatting in public conveniences. Impose hefty fines and mandatory community work orders for offenders.  THE FACTS SPEAK FOR THEMSELVES AND TO REJECT THIS PETITION FROM AN BIASED POLITICALLY CORRECT VISION IS UNDEMOCRATIC IN ITSELF.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
